Containers.Name: netatalk - AFP for UNRAID
Containers.Description: A plugin that integrates the legacy AFP file sharing protocol into newer UNRAID versions.
Containers.Changes: ###2023.09.02 - fix: cleaning of old files from USB drive - new: reduce wait times for stuck AFP processes ###2023.09.01 - release note: welcome to the first version of the AFP package. - release note: please report any problems in the support topic.
